p: At 3 days post challenge, no differences were observed in the extent of lung pathology seen in the Ad6-Vehicle and Ad6-CDV groups; four out of five hamsters had red mottled lungs in both groups. Similarly, no differences were detected between the untreated and treated groups at 10 days post challenge; white foci were found in the lungs in eight of 10 and six of 10 hamsters from the Ad6-Vehicle and Ad6-CDV groups, respectively.
